R

read(File) - Static method in class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadCF
Reads the rules file and validates it
ReadCF - Class in antiSpamFilter.validations
ReadCF - the rules file validation class

This class tests if a .cf file is a valid rules file, checking if it has only a rule between lines or a rule and a weight.
ReadCF() - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadCF
 
readFile(File) - Static method in class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadLOG
Reads the email log file and validates it
readFileRF(File) - Method in class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadFilesOptimization
Read the file "AntiSpamFilterProblem.NSGAII.rf" and find the index that which corresponds to the best set of FP and FN
readFileRS(File) - Method in class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadFilesOptimization
Read the file "AntiSpamFilterProblem.NSGAII.rf" and return the line that have the best configuration of the rules
ReadFilesOptimization - Class in antiSpamFilter.validations
ReadFilesOptimization -

Check the variables of the files "AntiSpamFilterProblem.NSGAII.rf" and "AntiSpamFilterProblem.NSGAII.rs" relatively to the optimization, choose the results that are better for mixed-use email boxes and after show that results on results window.
ReadFilesOptimization() - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadFilesOptimization
 
ReadLOG - Class in antiSpamFilter.validations
ReadLOG - the ham file and spam file validation class

This class tests if a .log file is a valid ham file or spam file, checking if it has at least the ID of the email .
ReadLOG() - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.validations.ReadLOG
 
refreshRulesList() - Method in class antiSpamFilter.GUI.AntiSpamFilterConfigurationGUI
Refresh the list of rules in the panel
resetWeightValue(String) - Method in class antiSpamFilter.AntiSpamFilterManualConfiguration
Resets a rule value to his original value
Rule - Class in antiSpamFilter.rules
Class Rule is the primary element in order to determine the right classification of an email as Spam or Ham.
Rule(String, double) - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.rules.Rule
The constructor method receives two parameters in order to generate a rule.
RuleStream - Class in antiSpamFilter.rules
Class RuleStream represents a series of Rules to be used in the AntiSpam Filter in order to determine if an email must be classified as Spam or Ham.
RuleStream(File) - Constructor for class antiSpamFilter.rules.RuleStream
The constructor method creates an array of Rules to be used in the AntiSpam Filter.
runOptimization() - Method in class antiSpamFilter.AntiSpamFilterAutomaticConfiguration
Confirms if the log and rules files are validated and calls the optimization class
runOptimization() - Method in class antiSpamFilter.AntiSpamFilterOptimization
